title: Gangplank Login Screen

embed.description: Login screen for Gangplank, the Saltwater Scourge. Download his music theme: https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/gangplank/s-MgT9e

body:
Dear Riot and especially the Riot Artists,
   I really like the animation for the Gangplank login screen; I've never seen anything like it before. It's like a stop-motion capture of Gangplank being painted onto wood that morphs into a animation where the paint shifts to make his image seem magical and alive. It's unbelievably awesome and the music just magnifies its awesomeness.

Thanks for taking the time to make it and if you can, please continue to come up with creative stuff like that. The art aspect of this game is a major part of what draws me to it.

replies.body: Glad you dig it! I will pass this on to the team members that worked on it! And stay tuned, there are more! :)
Is there anyway to download it to your home background? If there is i would love to know! Thanks!
